title: Random Bug Splats
body:
Nothing has changed on my PC or installations for months, other than the new patches from League.

Getting random bug splats in champ select, causing me to get penalized. Thanks riot!

replies.body:
Sounds like something might have gone wrong with the latest patch so the files you were downloading weren't correctly updating. It's not entirely uncommon, and happens sometimes when your network has some kind of blip or hiccup during patching. 

Try running a quick repair through the client options, and if that doesn't work you might need to use the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **force repatch**. I would also be safe and try using an ethernet connection during the repair/repatch to make sure nothing goes wrong during the patch.
